name: Apple monitor 24
description:
LED Cinema Display features a 27-inch glossy LED-backlit TFT 
active-matrix LCD display with IPS technology and an optimum resolution 
of 2560x1440. It has a 178 degree horizontal and vertical viewing angle,
 a "typical" brightness of 375 cd/m2, contrast ratio of 1000:1, and a 
12 ms response time.
